PreToolUse.matcher: tool == "Bash" && tool_input.command matches "git push --force|git push -f|git reset --hard|rm -rf"

hooks.command: node -e "console.error('[Hook] BLOCKED: Dangerous command detected. Use with extreme caution.');process.exit(1)"
node -e "console.error('[Hook] About to push to remote. Make sure you have reviewed the changes.')"

node -e "const fs=require('fs');let d='';process.stdin.on('data',c=>d+=c);process.stdin.on('end',()=>{const i=JSON.parse(d);const p=i.tool_input?.file_path;if(p&&fs.existsSync(p)){const c=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');const lines=c.split('\n');const matches=[];lines.forEach((l,idx)=>{if(/System\.out\.print/.test(l))matches.push((idx+1)+': '+l.trim())});if(matches.length){console.error('[Hook] WARNING: System.out.print found in '+p);matches.slice(0,5).forEach(m=>console.error('  '+m));console.error('[Hook] Use SLF4J logger instead')}}console.log(d)})"
